title: ABOUT ME
description: I'm a passionate, self-proclaimed developer who specializes in full stack development (React.js & Node.js). I am very enthusiastic about bringing the technical and visual aspects of digital products to life. User experience, pixel perfect design, and writing clear, readable, highly performant code matters to me. I am very much a progressive thinker and enjoy working on products end to end, from ideation all the way to development.
subtitle: Finally, some opportunities that's my interest.
